subject: Urgent: Q4 Report Due
body:
Hi,

I need the Q4 report by EOD tomorrow. Please make sure to include the sales figures.

Thanks,
Boss

subject: Tech Weekly: AI is taking over
body: This week in tech: AI agents are the new hotness. Read more...

subject: New Job Opportunity
body:
Hi,

We have a great opportunity for a Senior Engineer role. Are you interested?

subject: You won a cruise!
body: Click here to claim your prize.

subject: Meeting: Sprint Planning
body:
Hi Team,

Let's meet on Monday at 10 AM for sprint planning. Please update your tickets.

Best,
PM

subject: Feedback on Design
body:
Hello,

We reviewed the latest designs. We love the color scheme but the logo is too small. Can you fix it by Friday?

Regards,
Client

subject: [GitHub] Security Alert
body: We found a potential security vulnerability in your repository. Please review immediately.

subject: Dinner on Sunday?
body: Hi honey, are you coming over for dinner this Sunday? Let me know.

subject: Invoice Available
body: Your AWS invoice for October is ready. Total: $12.34.

subject: Code Review Request
body: Hey, can you review my PR? It's blocking the release.
